meanings.definition: Improve (a process or method) by making small changes.
meanings.sent1: She refines her baking skills by practicing every day.
meanings.sent2: The artist refines his painting technique with each new piece.
meanings.sent3: He refines his dance moves so much that he becomes the star of the show.
meanings.sent4: Like a skilled craftsman, she refines her pottery with precision and care.
meanings.sent5: The coach refines the team's strategy to ensure victory in the game.

meanings.definition: Remove impurities or unwanted elements from (a substance), typically as part of an industrial process.
meanings.sent1: The jeweler refines the gold to make it shine brightly.
meanings.sent2: The refinery refines crude oil to produce gasoline and other products.
meanings.sent3: She refines the sugar so much that it sparkles like diamonds.
meanings.sent4: The chef refines the sauce until it is pure perfection on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The filter refines the water, making it safe to drink.
